column4: when I run compiz, everytime I use alt-tab to switch from and then eventually back to gnome-terminal, gnome-terminal does not capture *any* keystrokes, if I move the window or switch back and forth with the mouse, it works again. where should I report this? it's 100% reproducible on my system
I plan to, should I file under compiz or gnome-terminal? also should I file in ubuntu or upstream?
